title: Portrait of Paula
brief_description: Paula, an engineer in New York, talks about herself while photographs of her as a child, her family and her wedding are shown. Paula discusses her marriage and human relationships, equal opportunity, women in the work-force, problems of management and her other interests in art and sailing.
